sent.orig: OK. Are you ready? Say Cheese!
Fresh sliced tomatoes, Mozzarella cheese, fresh garlic and fresh basil with Parmesan cheese.
sent.trans: 新鲜蕃茄片、芝士、蒜蓉及新鲜罗勒香叶。

sent.orig: Besides, cheese is an essential element of pizza, and the Chinese traditionally did not produce cheese.
sent.trans: 此外，奶酪是做比萨不可或缺的材料，而传统上中国人并没有生产奶酪。

sent.orig: One morning, Sniff & Scurry arrived at Cheese Station C & discovered there was no cheese.
sent.trans: 一天早上，嗅嗅和匆匆到了C宫，发现那里没有奶酪了。
